CostAnalytics.PluginDescription: Import cost data via CSV and calculate ROI metrics for marketing channels
CostAnalytics.CostManagementDescription: Manage your marketing cost data. Import costs via CSV or add them manually to track ROI across all channels.
CostAnalytics.ImportCSVDescription: Upload a CSV file containing your marketing costs. The costs will be matched to channels and used for ROI calculations.
CostAnalytics.AddManualCostDescription: Add a single cost entry manually.
CostAnalytics.CampaignNameHelp: Optional. Used to further categorize costs within a channel.
CostAnalytics.CostByChannelDocumentation: This report shows the marketing costs and ROI for each acquisition channel.
CostAnalytics.ROISummaryDocumentation: This report shows the overall return on investment across all marketing channels.
CostAnalytics.CSVFormatDescription: Your CSV file must include the following columns:
CostAnalytics.TargetWebsiteHelp: Select the website to import costs for. You can import costs to any website you have admin access to.
CostAnalytics.DeleteExistingCosts: Replace existing costs for the same dates
CostAnalytics.DeleteExistingCostsHelp: If checked, existing cost entries for the same date range will be removed before importing.
CostAnalytics.ImportWarnings: %s rows had errors and were skipped.
CostAnalytics.InvalidInput: Please fill in all required fields with valid values.
